negate.description: If set to true means that the entire condition shall be negated.

otherAccessRestriction.definition: Other access restriction not listed elsewhere.
otherAccessRestriction.description: Free test description of other access restrictions.

Authority.description: Object indicating the Authority issueing permits

name.description: Name (identifier) for the authority issuing permits

CalendarWeekInMonth.description: Calendar week within month (see ISO 8601). First Calendar week contains the first of the month, with the calendar week starting on a Monday. Several days of the first week of the month may occur in the previous calendar month. By construction, the last week of a preceding month can also be the first week of a subsequent month.

weekInMonth.definition: Indicates the week number within a month (see ISO 8601, i.e. with weeks commencing on a Monday).
weekInMonth.description: NOTE	By default, the WeekofMonth is calculated as follows. The calendar week commences on a Monday (as per ISO 8601). The first week of a month is the calendar week containing the first of the month. Several days of the first week of the month may occur in the previous calendar month. The last week of the month contains the last day of the month in question.

CalendarWeekInMonthType.description:
Specification of periods defined by relevant calendar weeks in a month, see ISO 8601.
NOTE Calendar weeks start with Monday. First week is the week containing the first of the month.

ChangeableTimePeriod.description: Specifies the time period with non-precise characteristics

ChangeableTimePeriodEnd.description: Object indicating end of the time period with non-precise characteristics

endType.description: indicates the type of non-precise characteristic time measure used
endType.definition: Time period begins with a fuzzy time or the duration is a fuzzy time

ChangeableTimePeriodEntry.description: Object provides information concerning one instance of a changeable time entry

entry.description: one value in a changeable time set

ChangeableTimePeriodSource.description: Object provides information concerning where details of the changeable time period are to be found

definition.description: indicates the type of non-precise characteristic time measure used
definition.definition: Time period begins with a fuzzy time or the duration is a fuzzy time

sourceLocator.description: URL where values and related dates of flexible time concepts are found

ChangeableTimePeriodStart.description: Object indicating start of the time period with non-precise characteristics

startType.description: indicates the type of non-precise characteristic time measure used
startType.definition: Time period begins with a fuzzy time or the duration is a fuzzy time

ComparisonOperatorType.description: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

Condition.description: Abstract class that specifies a condition for the validity of a certain road feature such as time, weather conditions, vehicle type, vehicle propulsion fuel, vehicle occupancy, vehicle usage, restrictions of the vehicle driver’s licence permissions, vehicle dimensions or weight characteristics.

negate.description: If set to true means that the entire condition shall be negated.

ConditionSet.description: Groups a number of conditions into a condition set

negate.description: If set to true means that the entire condition shall be negated.

operator.definition: Specifies the operator to be applied between the conditions in the set.
operator.description: The operator to be used in the characteristic comparison operation.

consultationName.description: Free text descriptive name for the consultation given by the Local Authority.

endOfconsultation.description: Time and date of the end of the consultation period

howToComment.description: Free text description detailing how to comment on the proposal which is the subject of the consultation.

localReference.description: Free text reference to an identifier for the consultation defined by the Local Authority.

pointOfContactAddress.description: Postal or office address location to support receipt of comments / objections to consultation proposals.

pointOfContactEmail.description: Email address location to support receipt of comments / objections to consultation proposals.

startOfconsultation.description: Time and date of the start of the consultation period

urlAdditionalInformation.description: Web address (URL) for where to find further information related to the consultation.

CurrencyType.description: Standard specified three-letter ("Alpha-3") codes for currencies worldwide in accordance with ISO 4217. Note this is a select subset based on UK usage but permits extension.

DayType.description: A list of days of the week

DayWeekMonth.description: Specification of periods defined by the intersection of days or instances of them, calendar weeks and months.  [EN 16157-7:2018]

items.description: Applicable day of the week. “All days of the week” is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute. [EN 16157-7:2018]
Applicable  month  of  the  year. “All months of the year” is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute.

DirectedLinear.description: Object indicating characteristics relating to specified direction linear geometric location

DriverCondition.description: Object indicating condition related to driver characteristics

driverCharacteristicsType.description: indicates a specific type of driver characteristic

ElementaryStreetUnit.description: Object to enable linkage of Regulated Place geometry to the National Street Gazetteer

emissionClassificationEuro.description:
The minimum Euro emission classification the vehicle(s) have to comply   with   according   to   the   1970
Directive 70/220/EEC   and   its   several amendments. Note that vehicleType and
fuelType need to be provided in order to
make this classification explicit.
emissionClassificationEuro.definition: The minimum Euro emission classification the vehicle(s) have to comply with according to the 1970 Directive 70/220/EEC and its several amendments. Note that vehicleType and fuelType need to be provided in order to make this classification explicit.

emissionClassificationOther.description:
Some  other  (probably  locally  defined)
value(s) for emission classification.
emissionClassificationOther.definition: Some other (probably locally defined) value(s) for emission classification.

ExtensionEnumeration.description: Object supporting the user-definition of a new list entry-to permit exceptional extension of the data model

definition.description: user defined definition for the new list entry

enumeratedList.description: enumeration list that the next list entry is to be applied to

ExternalReference.description: Object to enable linkage of Regulated Place geometry to the National Street Gazetteer

GeneralRegulation.description: Object indicating a specific regulation (other than speed limit or user-defined offlist regulation)

regulationType.description: indicates the type of regulation referenced

Geometry.description:
Geometry string defined as per WKT (RFC7946).

For moving traffic TROs, the geometry is expected to be defined as appropriate. Often this can by use of the linearGeometry, with coordinates derived from a well-known linear road network model (such as OS Highways). For kerbside restriction TROs, the geometry would normally be represented by a zone (polygon) or linearGeometry representing the shape of the related kerbline.

HeaviestAxleWeightCharacteristic.description: Object indicating condition related to the heaviest axle of vehicle

heaviestAxleWeight.description: indicates a characteristic relating to the heaviest axle of vehicle
heaviestAxleWeight.definition: The weight of the heaviest axle on the vehicle.

InstanceOfDayInMonth.description: Specification of periods defined  by  the  instance of a specific weekday within a month (e.g. 3rd Tuesday in May).

InstanceOfDayWithinMonth.description: Instances of a day of the week in a month

items.description: Applicable day of the week. “All days of the week” is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute. [EN 16157-7:2018]
defines instances of a day in a month (e.g. second Tuesday)
Applicable month of the year. “All months of the year” is expressed by non- inclusion of this attribute.

LinearDirectionType.description: Indicates the applicable direction for a linear direction

LinearGeometry.description: Object indicating characteristic for a linear geometry location

direction.description: indicates the direction of the applicability of the referenced regulation

lateralPosition.description: indicates the lateral position across a road of the linear representation of a regulated place.

representation.description: indicates the nature of the point location for a linear representation of a regulated place.

LinearLateralPositionType.description: List of enumeration lists that may be extended

LinearType.description: List of representations derived from a linear location

MaximumGrossWeightCharacteristic.description: Maximum gross weight characteristic of a vehicle.

grossVehicleWeight.description: The gross weight of the vehicle and its load, including any trailers.

items.description: The meaning of the weight value

vehicleHeight.description:
height of the highest part, excluding 
antennae, of an individual vehicle from the 
reference plane defined by the bottom of the 
wheels touching the ground, in metres
vehicleHeight.definition: The height of the highest part, excluding antennae, of an individual vehicle above the road surface, in metres.

vehicleLength.description: The overall distance between the front and back of an individual vehicle, including the length of any trailers, couplings, embedded features etc.
vehicleLength.definition: The overall distance between the front and back of an individual vehicle, including the length of any trailers, couplings, embedded features etc.

vehicleWidth.description: The maximum width of an individual vehicle, including any features embedded or fixed on it, in metres.
vehicleWidth.definition: The maximum width of an individual vehicle, including any features embedded or fixed on it, in metres.

NonVehicularRoadUserCondition.description: Object indicating characteristics about non-vehicular road users

nonVehicularRoadUser.description: Indicates the type of non-vehicular road user
nonVehicularRoadUser.definition: Types of non-vehicular road users for which the condition applies.

NonVehicularRoadUserType.description: List of non-vehicular road user types

NumberOfAxlesCharacteristic.description: Number of axles characteristic of a vehicle.

comparisonOperator.description: The operator  to  be used in  the  vehicle characteristic comparison operation.
comparisonOperator.definition: The operator to be used in the vehicle characteristic comparison operation.

numberOfAxles.description: The    total    number    of    axles    of    an individual vehicle.
numberOfAxles.definition: The total number of axles of an individual vehicle.

NumbersOfOccupants.description: Object indicating conditional restrictions based on the number of vehicle occupants

operator.description: The operator to be used in the characteristic comparison operation.
operator.definition: Specifies the operator to be applied between the conditions in the set.

value.definition: Period in which the driver has held and continues to hold a driving license.

OccupantCondition.description: Object indicating specific vehicle occupant condition restrictions

OffListRegulation.description: Object indicating type of regulation other than those already listed (extension mechanism)

legislationCrossReference.description: Cross reference to legislative instruments and orders for this regulation

regulationFullText.description: Full description of the other type of regulation

regulationShortName.description: User-defined short name for other type of regulation

OrderReportingPointType.description: Candidate - Nature of the TRO process Reporting Point represented in this record

PayloadType.description: The type of load carried by the vehicle, especially in respect of hazardous loads.

Period.description:
continuous time period or a set of discontinuous time periods defined 
by the intersection of a set of criteria all within an overall delimiting 
interval

periodName.description: Free text name of the period.

recurrents.description: the number of repetitions of a repeating period

recurringPeriod.description: the duration between the start of instances of repeating periods. Where changeable start and end time concepts are defined (such as Easter) this duration should be set to an appropriate duration (e.g. one year) if the changeable time concept follows a known pattern.

PermitCondition.description: Object supporting the characteristics of a permit related condition

locationRelatedPermit.description: is the referenced permit related to a specified geography?
locationRelatedPermit.definition: indication whether the permit is related to a specific location or route in the zone.

maxDurationOfPermit.description: he maximum validity duration a permit could have in hours
maxDurationOfPermit.definition: the maximum validity duration a permit could have in hours

permitIdentifier.description: identifier for the permit scheme referenced (e.g. resident parking zone A)
permitIdentifier.definition: URL of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested

schemeIdentifier.description: free text name for the permit scheme referenced
schemeIdentifier.definition: URL of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested

type.description: the type of the referenced permit
type.definition: URL of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested

whereToApplyForPermit.description: URL of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested
whereToApplyForPermit.definition: URL of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested

whereToCallForPermit.description: Contact telephone number of the competent authority where an application for a permit can be requested
whereToCallForPermit.definition: Phone number for contacting the railway operator (at level crossings without a dedicated phone).

PermitSubjectToFee.description: Object containing information relating to the cost and restrictions relating to use of a permit

amountDue.description: Monetary amount related to use of or purchase of permit

maximumAccessDuration.description: Maximum duration that is permitted in relationship to use of this permit
maximumAccessDuration.definition: maximum time permitted in CZ after first entry

minimumTimeToNextEntry.description: Minimum duration between last use of permit and next permitted use of permit

paymentInformation.description: URL for further information on permit and related payment
paymentInformation.definition: link to the website where payment information can be found

PointGeometry.description: Object indicating characteristic for a point geometry location

representation.description: indicates the nature of the point location for a point representation of a regulated place.

PointType.description: List of representations derived from a point location

Polygon.description: Object indicating characteristics relating to polygon geometric location

Provision.description:
Attribute identifying whether the specified Provision is an addition or deletion. TRUE = addition; FALSE = deletion.

TRO provisions amending regulations should provide two Provision records - one, marked as Deletion, indicating the state of the regulation before amendment; and a second, marked as Addition, indicating the intended state of the regulation post amendment.

provisionDescription.description: free text description of the referenced provision

PublicHoliday.description: Object indicating characteristics relating to a public holiday

publicHolidayName.description: free text name for the referenced public holiday
publicHolidayName.definition: Specification of a specific public holiday by its name.

RateLine.description: Object indicating characteristics for a rate line within a rate table

description.description: free-text description associated with this rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
description.definition: free-text description associated with this rate line.

durationEnd.description: If used, indicates the end time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the end of a time-based tier charge rate. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
durationEnd.definition: If used, indicates the end time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the end of a time-based tier charge rate.

durationStart.description: If used, indicates the start time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the start of a time-based tier charge rate. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
durationStart.definition: If used, indicates the start time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the start of a time-based tier charge rate.

incrementPeriod.description: the time period for incrementing the rate line charge. If set to the same as the duration of the period between the durationStart and durationEnd the increment will occur once per period, i.e. a flat rate time-based tier charge rate.  [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
incrementPeriod.definition: the time period for incrementing the rate line charge. If set to the same as the duration of the period between the durationStart and durationEnd the increment will occur once per period, i.e. a flat rate time-based tier charge rate.

maxValue.description: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
maxValue.definition: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line.

minValue.description: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
minValue.definition: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection, regardless of the actual calculated value of the rate line.

sequence.description: the ordered sequence of this RateLine instance within the RateLineCollection. Used to define the order of operation of multiple rate lines. Typically used to ensure taxes and surcharges are applied correctly. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
sequence.definition: the ordered sequence of this RateLine instance within the RateLineCollection. Used to define the order of operation of multiple rate lines. Typically used to ensure taxes and surcharges are applied correctly.

type.description: indicates the nature of the rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
type.definition: indicates the nature of the rate line

usageCondition.description: Indicates conditions on the use of this rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
usageCondition.definition: Indicates conditions on the use of this rate line

value.description: the value of the fee to be charged in respect of this rate line. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
value.definition: the value of the fee to be charged in respect of this rate line

RateLineCollection.description:
group of rate line elements that logically group together within one 
rate table, e.g. such as the rate lines for the different tiers of a time based tier rate table

applicableCurrency.description: The monetary currency that rates are specified in this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
applicableCurrency.definition: The monetary currency that rates are specified in this rate line collection.

endValidUsagePeriod.description: the end time for the validity of this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
endValidUsagePeriod.definition: the end time for the validity of this rate line collection

maxTime.description: A maximum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
maxTime.definition: A maximum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

maxValueCollection.description: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
maxValueCollection.definition: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

minTime.description: A minimum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
minTime.definition: A minimum session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

minValueCollection.description: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
minValueCollection.definition: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

resetTime.description: Time that rate resets.  Example a rate table that charges £2 per hour with a max value collection of £10, resets at 2 am.  At 2 am the £2 per hour fee would start to charge until the £10 is reached. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
resetTime.definition: Time that rate resets.  Example a rate table that charges $2 per hour with a max value collection of $10, resets at 2am.  At 2 am the $2 per hour fee would start to charge until the $10 is reached.

sequence.description: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
sequence.definition: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection

startValidUsagePeriod.description: the start time for the validity of this rate line collection. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
startValidUsagePeriod.definition: the start time for the validity of this rate line collection

RateTable.description: specific set of rate charges relating to one or more locations and optionally one set of eligibility criteria

additionalInformation.description: URI locator for supplementary additional information concerning use of the rate table. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
additionalInformation.definition: URI locator for supplementary additional information concerning use of the rate table

type.description: Defines the type of rate in use. [Defined by APDS - ISO/TS 5206-1]
type.definition: Defines the type of rate in use.

RateUsageConditionsType.description: List of rate usage condition types

RegulatedPlace.description: Object indicating the geographical and spatial location subject to a regulation

description.description: Free text description of the regulated place

Regulation.description: Object indicating the characteristics of a regulation

isDynamic.description: Indicates if the regulation is dynamic in nature

RoadCondition.description: Object indicating characteristics concerning the type of road.

negate.description: If set to true means that the entire condition shall be negated.
negate.definition: If set to true means that the entire condition shall be negated.

roadType.definition: Type of road (e.g. motorway, express way, etc.).

section.description: Reference to the section of the TRO

SpecialDay.description: Object indicating the characteristics of an identified (special) day

intersectWithApplicableDays.description: When true, the period is the intersection of applicable days and this special day. When false, the period is the union of applicable days and this special day.
intersectWithApplicableDays.definition: When true, the period is the intersection of applicable days and this special day. When false, the period is the union of applicable days and this special day.

publicEvent.description: Type of public event on this special day.
publicEvent.definition: Type of public event on this special day.

specialDayType.description: Specification of a special day, for example schoolDay, publicHoliday, ...
specialDayType.definition: Specification of a special day, for example schoolDay, publicHoliday, ...

SpecialDayType.description: Collection of special types of days. [EN 16157-7:2018]

SpeedLimit.description: Abstract object representing a speed limit regulation

SpeedLimitProfileBased.description: Object indicating characterisitics related to speed limits defined by profile

type.description: nature of the speed limit profile used

SpeedLimitValueBased.description: Object indicating speed limit regulation - defined by speed value

type.description: type of speed limit value indicated

SpeedLimitValueType.description: List of speed limit value types

TemporaryRegulation.description: Object indicating the presence of a temporary regulation

temporarilyOverriddenRegulations.description: Indicates the identity of regulations overridden by this temporary regulation

TimePeriodOfDay.description: specification of a continuous period of time within a 24 hour period

TimeValidity.description: A  continuous  or  discontinuous  period  of  validity  defined  by overall   bounding   start   and   end   times   and   the   possible intersection of valid periods (potentially recurring) with the complement of exception periods (also potentially recurring).

end.definition: End of bounding period of validity defined by date and time.

start.definition: Start of bounding period of validity defined by date and time.

UniqueStreetReferenceNumber.description: Object to enable linkage of Regulated Place geometry to the National Street Gazetteer

ValidityCondition.description: Object indicating conditional restrictions based on times/timing.

VehicleCharacteristics.description: The characteristics of a vehicle, e.g. lorry of gross weight greater than 30 tonnes.

fuelType.description: The type of fuel used by the vehicle.
fuelType.definition: The type of fuel used by the vehicle.

loadType.description: The type of load carried by the vehicle, especially in respect of hazardous loads.
loadType.definition: The type of load carried by the vehicle, especially in respect of hazardous loads.

vehicleEquipment.description: The type of equipment in use or on board the vehicle.
vehicleEquipment.definition: The type of equipment in use or on board the vehicle.

vehicleUsage.description: The type of usage of the vehicle (i.e. for what purpose is the vehicle being used).
vehicleUsage.definition: The type of usage of the vehicle (i.e. for what purpose is the vehicle being used).

yearOfFirstRegistration.description: Year of first registration of the vehicle
yearOfFirstRegistration.definition: Year of first registration of the vehicle

VehicleEquipmentType.description: The type of equipment in use or on board the vehicle.

WeekInMonthType.description: Week of month, where the first week starts on first of month, and each subsequent week starts on the same day of the week.

WeekOfMonth.description: provides information concerning an identifiable week in a calendar month - where the week starts on the same day of the week as the month

applicableWeek.definition: Applicable week of the month (1 to 5).  “All weeks of the month” is expressed by non-inclusion of this attribute.

targetEnumeratedList.description: List of enumeration lists that may be extended

description: DTRO v3.2.2 data model JSON schema
